titleStmt.title: The penitent death of a vvoefull sinner. Or, the penitent death of John Atherton executed at Dublin the 5. of December. 1640. With some annotations upon severall passages in it. As also the sermon, with some further enlargements, preached at his buriall. / By Nicholas Barnard Deane of Ardagh in Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Bernard, Nicholas, d. 1661.
Atherton, John, 1598-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the Society of Stationers,

notesStmt.note: "A sermon preached at the buriall of the said Iohn Atherton ... Printed at Dublin, 1641" (Wing B2017; Thomason E.176[4]) has a separate dated title page, pagination and register.
Includes two letters written by John Atherton prior to his execution: "The letter to his wife", dated "Decemb. 1. 1641. [sic, i.e 1640]"; "The letter to his children", dated "Decemb. 4. 1640.".
Errata on final page for "the Relation" and "the Sermon".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
A relation of the penitent death of the said Iohn Atherton -- The letter to his wife -- The letter to his children -- A sermon preached at the buriall of the said Iohn Atherton.
